Package org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.recipe

Interface SmeltingExtension

All Superinterfaces:
RecipeExtension
public interface SmeltingExtension extends RecipeExtension
A RecipeExtension for smelting, blast furnace, smoker and campfire recipes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    blasting(net.minecraft.data.recipes.RecipeCategory category, net.minecraft.tags.TagKey<net.minecraft.world.item.Item> in, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike out, float exp, int time)
    Adds a smelting recipe that can be performed in a regular furnace and a blast furnace.
    default void

  • Method Details

    • smelting

      default void smelting(net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike in, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike out, float exp, int time)
      Adds a smelting recipe.

    • blasting

      default void blasting(net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike in, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike out, float exp, int time)
      Adds a smelting recipe that can be performed in a regular furnace and a blast furnace. time should be the value for the normal furnace. It'll be adjusted for the blast furnace automatically.

    • cooking

      default void cooking(net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike in, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike out, float exp, int time)
      Adds a smelting recipe that can be performed in a regular furnace and a smoker. time should be the value for the normal furnace. It'll be adjusted for the smoker automatically.

    • campfire

      default void campfire(net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike in, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike out, float exp, int time)
      Adds a smelting recipe that can be performed in a regular furnace, a smoker anda campfire. time should be the value for the normal furnace. It'll be adjusted for the smoker and the campfire automatically.
